|  [FinishedLoading](./blockly.events.finishedloading.md) | Class for a finished loading event. Used to notify the developer when the workspace has finished loading (i.e domToWorkspace). Finished loading events do not record undo or redo.  Blockly.Events.FinishedLoading |
|  [MarkerMove](./blockly.events.markermove.md) | Class for a marker move event.  Blockly.Events.MarkerMove |
|  [Selected](./blockly.events.selected.md) | Class for a selected event.  Blockly.Events.Selected |

|  [TrashcanOpen](./blockly.events.trashcanopen.md) | Class for a trashcan open event.  Blockly.Events.TrashcanOpen |
|  [Ui](./blockly.events.ui.md) | Class for a UI event. |
|  [UiBase](./blockly.events.uibase.md) | Base class for a UI event. UI events are events that don't need to be sent over the wire for multi-user editing to work (e.g. scrolling the workspace, zooming, opening toolbox categories). UI events do not undo or redo.  Blockly.Events.UiBase |
|  [VarBase](./blockly.events.varbase.md) | Abstract class for a variable event.  Blockly.Events.VarBase |
|  [VarCreate](./blockly.events.varcreate.md) | Class for a variable creation event.  Blockly.Events.VarCreate |

|  [VarRename](./blockly.events.varrename.md) | Class for a variable rename event.  Blockly.Events.VarRename |
|  [ViewportChange](./blockly.events.viewportchange.md) | Class for a viewport change event.  Blockly.Events.ViewportChange |
